title: АльфаРомео
overview: Intersectional feminist Dasha from provincial Zhigulevsk wants to prove to the patriarchal father the importance of feminism. But in order to achieve what she wants, she needs to become a popular blogger and get a capital grant for an educational project in her hometown. For this, she begins to shoot stories about the correction of the toxic "alpha" and the fighter without rules Anton, whom she accidentally meets on the train on the way to Moscow.
